QuestData.Title: Into the Plains
QuestData.Description:
The green dragonflight has returned to their gardens in the nearby plains. Queen Alexstrasza wishes for you to make contact with Merithra of the Dream.
The centaur of those plains are fierce hunters. To reach the Emerald Gardens, you will need to establish diplomacy with them first.
Be respectful, but show no weakness.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet the Shikaar scout in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet the Shikaar scout in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
QuestData.RewardText: You serve as an envoy of the dragons, then. Times are changing.
